PHRASE.LANG: Ces sont les Spinners qui créent les Grims. Les Spinners capturent des humains et tissent un cocon autour d'eux. Ce cocon transforme alors lentement son hôte en Grim. [#Legal]
Grims are created using Spinners. Spinners capture human hosts and weave cocoons around them. The cocoon slowly rebuilds the host as they are converted into Grims. [#Legal]
